allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add featured thank you section for Graeagle Land & Water

- Add prominent logo and gratitude message above Community Partners
- Style with centered layout, border separator, and responsive sizing

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update CLAUDE.md: always take action without asking

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Redesign site with terminal aesthetic

- Replace canvas space animation with static terminal-style layout
- IBM Plex Mono font, minimal grayscale palette
- Blunt copy: whoami, cat about.txt, ls tools/
- CRT scanlines overlay, blinking cursor
- Mobile responsive
- Remove script.js and audio file

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Redesign with terminal aesthetic

- Replace animated cards with clean terminal-style layout
- IBM Plex Mono font, minimal grayscale palette
- Command-line inspired navigation: whoami, ls ./tools, cat links.txt
- Subtle CRT scanlines, blinking cursor
- Consistent terminal styling across toolbox
- Mobile responsive

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
